ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 import modules::pharma output application/json var schema = pharma::getSchema(attributes.queryParams.customer_name, p('database.wms.blueyonder.schema'),p('database.wms.mega.schema')) --- "WITH Enviados AS ( SELECT DISTINCT sl.ORDNUM ,COUNT(DISTINCT sl.SHIP_ID) AS ENVIOS FROM "++ schema ++".shipmenT_LINE sl WHERE sl.ORDNUM in(" ++ payload ++ ") and sl.wh_id = 'AVIOR-27' GROUP BY ORDNUM ), Despachados AS ( SELECT distinct shpl.ordnum , COUNT(distinct cm.car_move_id) AS DESPACHADOS FROM "++ schema ++".car_move cm JOIN "++ schema ++".trlr tr on tr.trlr_id = cm.trlr_id JOIN "++ schema ++".stop st ON cm.car_move_id = st.car_move_id JOIN "++ schema ++".shipment shp ON st.stop_id = shp.stop_id JOIN "++ schema ++".shipmenT_LINE shpl ON shp.ship_id = shpl.ship_id WHERE tr.trlr_stat = 'D' AND shpl.wh_id = 'AVIOR-27' AND shpl.ORDNUM in (" ++ payload ++ ") GROUP BY shpl.ORDNUM ) SELECT Enviados.ORDNUM, Enviados.ENVIOS, Despachados.DESPACHADOS FROM Enviados join Despachados on Enviados.ordnum = Despachados.ordnum"
